content: pattern in japanese only but charted direct link to pattern pdf 1 calls for japanese size 5/0 crochet hook 3 0 mm gauge listed says 2 pattern repeats and 8 row = 7 3cm square **note ** pattern for the flower corsage in the picture on the website is not included it has a separate pattern available here 2 **note ** there s a corresponding adult-sized version here 3 1 http //www gosyo co jp/img/acrobat/27ss/546b pdf 2 http //www rakuten co jp/gosyo/461397/713923/870239/870853/ 3 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/28-17-platinum-kirakira-cotton-short-bolero
